title: Can we leave Swain how he is?
body:
Swain is one of my favourite champions to play. He is not, as you said, a useless dud or an unstoppable menace. He is completely unique and has a great kit. its true, he doesn't match 'the master tactician' but really, Swain is a great champion right now and you would honestly be better off changing his catchphrase.

{{champion:50}}
